body.name: T-DAGGER Wireless Gaming Mouse- USB Cordless PC Accessories Computer Mice with LED Backlit, Ergonomic Gamer Laptop Mouse with 7 Silent Buttons, 5 Adjustable DPI Plug & Play for PC
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 59 mins
features: 【Silent & Durable Click】PC gaming mouse will make no noise when clicking left or right buttons, no worry for disturbing others. Suitable for public places such as office, library dormitory, cafe, etc. Our wireless mouse is tested for up to 5 million clicks.

【Cool LED Backlights】PC mouse for gaming provides a BLUE LED backlit, greatly matching your cool style and creating a great atmosphere to enhance your gaming fun. Besides, gaming mouse will make your gaming room more special, especially at night.(Light is disabled)

【5 DPI Levels for Gaming and Work】Wireless gaming mouse can be driven from 4000-2400-2000-1500-1000 DPI, providing excellent sensitivity and precise tracking on a wide range, ideal for gaming and daily work.

【Advanced Energy Saving Mode】To save energy, the PC accessories wireless computer mouse will enter sleep mode if it is NOT used after 8 minutes, just press any button to wake it up. The bottom button also can be used to control the mouse’s light on/off or switch on/off.

【Wide Compatibility】T-DAGGER wireless gaming mouse, work perfectly for Windows 7/8/10/XP/Vista/me/2000/Mac10.X, etc. For Mac OS, side buttons are not available.(USB receiver is beside the battery compartment .)

【Worry-free Guarantee】: T-DAGGER promises 18 MONTH AFTER-SALE SERVICE ( return for a new one or full refund).PLZ contact us if there exists any problem with the mouse.T-DAGGER is conmmitted to satisfy your needs.HOW TO CONTACT US➡️ 1. CLICK OUR STORE NAME "Mouselife" 2.CLICK THE "Ask a question".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Less Noise The buttons of mouse are optimally positioned for quick and noiseless. You don't need to worry disturbing others even at night. Enjoy your game or work time. 2.4G Wireless Connection Plug and Play. Avoid the hassle of cluttered wires. USB mouse with 7 Buttons controls all functions for Superior efficiency. Portable Size 4.88x2.8x1.54" of size makes computer mouse great for travel. And the ergonomic design with thumb rest supports your hand perfectly.

Fit Any Grip Style Suitable for plam grip, glaw grip, fingertip grip. Coating with skin-like material, wireless gaming mouse becomes sweat-proof and non-slip, and helps reduce hand fatigue. LED Light Effect (Disabled) T-DAGGER Gaming Mouse adds a lot of cool vibes to enhance your gaming fun, especially at night. Great for Gaming Extremely comfortable and precise experience for PC gaming. This wireless mouse work well with Windows 7/8/10/ Vista, Mac, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse i personally use it for gaming and it works perfectly fine haven't seen any delay or anything, It looks so good too and the quality is magnificent, the clicking is quiet, its very comfortable to use, best mouse I've bought so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly silent mouse.
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of the clicking noise. This gaming mouse fixed the problem and it works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little $19 mouse...
reviews.reviewText: ...and a few days later it is about $5 cheaper now! Good size, good weight. ergonomic & comfortable. Love the soft material used on the top of the mouse & left/right-click buttons. My favorite feature is how QUIET these primary buttons are -- quietest mouse ever! (To be fair, though, the forward, back, and dpi buttons are rather clicky.) I'm not using this for gaming, so it features ample buttons for browsing the web and everyday operations. Have not had a single problem with connectivity or waking up from sleep. My only insignificant, minor gripe is the plastic used on the sides of the mouse feels a little cheap, it takes away from otherwise 'premium' feeling mouse...but in the big picture, I don't care! Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid Mouse for Everyday Work Despite Battery Issues
reviews.reviewText: Mouse is a bit larger than the average size and fits my hand nicely while feeling quite sturdy as I like a heavier mouse. Has 2 modes, one where the RGB lights stay on and one where the mouse is unlit. You can change dpi settings as well, though there really isn't any way to tell what the number is, you just have to kind of play with it until it feels comfortable for you.Biggest issue is battery life. I've gone through 3 AA batteries in 4 months on this mouse, which is crazy considering my wireless logitech gaming mouse probably uses 1 battery in a year. If you run it with the RGB lights on the battery will drain incredibly fast. With normal unlit use you will probably get about a month or so out of a single battery if you are lucky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Working great, nice feel, love the extra buttons on the side for gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price!
reviews.reviewText: My son bought this for gaming purposes but he uses it for school as well. One of his classmates tried it and said it worked better than the his gaming mouse. That’s coming from a kid who owns a $150 gaming mouse. I used it myself just to search through google and it feels legit, smooth and it’s fast. Good mouse for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought as a gift
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for my son. He loves it. Good quality and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lights are cool, lots of different variations. Holds a charge for days of use. Charges fast when it does die. Very accurate and has great range. Very comfortable to grip. Highly. Recommend.

I’m 31 years old and like to game once in awhile. Don’t have much to compare it to but this mouse was exactly what I was hoping for.Looking at all the options on Amazon, I don’t care about crazy RBG lighting or anything fancy, just wanted something that felt quality, worked well, and fit my hand nicely. This mouse is perfect
the programmable buttons not existent... other than that it's a great mouse.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heavy mouse bad for gaming does not slide on mouse pad
reviews.reviewText: Good looking optical mouse good for use at office super bad for gaming heavy does not slide other wise its quiet battery life is good. Average quality
Pouris comme produit..la batterie dure 1 heure..après cela aucun signal.
